data.description: Width of a single support structure line. Support consists of support infill and a support interface. The interface can be adjusted separately.
data.img_description: This image shows the support structure of a single layer.
data.hints: - Increasing the support line width slightly results in stronger support and decreases print time slightly.
data.notes: Note: Be careful when increasing the support line width when using PVA material, as it might clog the nozzle.
